articles.description: In case you didn’t know, the DualSense controller made for the PS5 can vibrate to the tune of your Spotify music when you plug it into your Windows 10 PC. It’s nothing like feeling the vibration of PS5 games, but it’s still a neat trick.
articles.content:
Youll need a USB-C cable and the Spotify app for PC
You dont need a PS5 for this trick.
Photo by Vjeran Pavic / The Verge
